name: Rywell Dog Cooling Mat 2.0,44 * 32 Thicken Cooling Mat for Extra Large Dog, Internal Waterproof& Endothermic Color Changing Arc-Chill Cool Fiber(QMAX>0.5) for Pet in Summer, Washable, Non-Toxic
short_description: 🐶【Discover the Rywell Cooling Revolution】 Introducing the Rywell Next Generation Dog Cooling Mat! Rywell dog cooling mats offer luxurious comfort and enhanced durability, taking comfort to a whole new level. Designed to be thicker than most products on the market, Rywell dog cooling mat ensures your pet enjoys ultimate comfort and cooling, even on hot summer days.Our dog cooling mat boasts state-of-the-art cooling technology and a vivid color-changing effect, making it truly unmatched.

🐶【Interactive Cooling Visuals】Be amazed by the temperature-responsive surface! Our advanced thermochromic dog cooling mat changes color from deep blue to light as it absorbs heat and then returns to blue once cooled, creating an engaging visual display of the cooling process at work.This amazing feature not only looks cool, but it lets you witness the heat absorption and cooling process in action. Get one today and treat your furry friend to the ultimate cool and comfortable lounging experience!

🐶【Superior Performance&Innovative Cooling】Stay ahead of the heatwave this summer with our premium dog cooling mat, made from Japan's well-known Arc-Chill cooling fabric. Experience a surprising 4-6°F drop in temperature, protecting your dog from overheating&dehydration on hot days. Suitable for use indoors or outdoors, simply set it on your pet's favorite resting spot to provide a revitalizing cold they'll love.As a faithful companion through numerous summers, the Rywell dog cooling mat assures that your fur baby will bask in refreshing comfort year after year, transforming even the hottest locations into their favorite retreat. Trust us: your dog will not only like it, but also desire it!

🐶【Effortless Moisture &Safe Management】 Rywell dog cooling mat is treated with an advanced waterproofing treatment to effectively ward off spills, sweat, and other pet-related moisture issues, making it easy to manage moisture and stay fresh. Simply wipe or spot clean to keep it dry and clean without worrying about complicated operations,and it is created with non-toxic, non-irritating fibers that are devoid of dangerous chemicals. If your dog chews on the mat, you won't have to worry about him eating dangerous things. providing you and your pet with a pleasurable time of pure relaxation.

🐶【Unmatched Versatility & Longevity】Rywell dog cooling mat is designed for large breeds such as Labradors and Golden Retrievers, and maintains a pleasantly cool feel in any environment. Its non-slip particle design protects your furniture from spills and stains, while its lightweight and foldable design makes it easy to transport and store. The sturdy and durable design of Rywell Dog Cooling Pads makes them suitable for use in cages, car seats, sleeping beds, or any pet's favorite resting area, ensuring years of stable and comfortable use.

🐶【Easy To Clean & Maintain】 Caring for Rywell dog cooling mat is easy as it's wash and build resistant. It can be machine washed or hand washed in cold water and still retain their original shape after multiple washes. After washing, please hang it in a cool and ventilated place to dry. Please note that the cooling fabric may be impaired by prolonged direct sunlight or exposure to UV rays. To maintain its effectiveness, avoid bleaching, ironing, or using the dryer.

name: Rywell Dog Cooling Mat, 44*32 Super Thick & Comfortable Cooling Mat for Large Dog with Arc-Chill 3.0 & PCM Tech(Q-Max>0.5), Endothermic Color Changing&Dual Sided for All-Year Use, Portable for Pet Bed
short_description: 🐶[Keep Your Pup Cool with Rywell PCM & Arc-Chill 3.0 Cooling Tech] Say goodbye to sweaty paws and hot fur! Rywell dog cooling mat uses the magic of PCM (Phase Change Material) to absorb excess heat and and lowers the temperature by for hours. PCM actively absorbs and releases heat, lowering your pet's temperature by 5-8°F, it stays cooler longer, ensuring your furry friend feels cool even on those toasty summer days. Plus, with the added power of Arc-Chill 3.0 technology, the cooling effect works faster and lasts longer, giving your pet that refreshing, chill vibe they’ll love!

🐶[Watch the Coolness Happen with Color-Changing Fun] It’s like magic—but cooler! As your pet relaxes on Rywell dog cooling mat, the cooling effect is visible. The mat changes color from a soothing blue to a lighter shade as it absorbs heat. It’s not just a cooling mat; it’s a visual treat for you and your pet! You’ll be able to see when your pet is getting that much-needed chill time, making it feel like a mini spa session every time they lay down.

🐶[Cozy Comfort for All Seasons with Safe, Soft Fillings] Whether it’s sunny and warm or chilly outside, Rywell dog cooling mat has your pet covered. The dual-sided design makes it perfect for all-year-round comfort—one side keeps your pet cool in summer, while the other provides warmth when the temperatures drop. Made from soft, safe, and comfortable fillings, this mat is 3 to 5 times thicker than most mats, offering your pet a soft cloud-like surface to rest on. It’s especially great for older pets or those who need extra support to relax.

🐶[Durable, Waterproof & Adventure-Ready] Tough enough to handle even the most energetic pups! Rywell dog cooling mat is made with super durable Oxford fabric and reinforced stitching, so it can survive even the most playful chewers. And the best part? It’s waterproof! No need to worry about spills or accidents—liquids won’t seep through, so your floors and furniture stay dry. Plus, it’s machine washable, making it easy to keep clean and fresh after every adventure.

🐶[Portable & Ready for Playtime] Whether you're heading for an outdoor adventure or snuggling up on the couch, Rywell’s cooling mat for dog has got you covered. With its handy built-in handle, it’s easy to take wherever your pet goes. Lightweight, portable, and available in various sizes to fit pets of all breeds, this mat ensures your furry friend always has a comfy place to rest—Wherever your pet goes, comfort follows!
